Posts.Content:
Hi,I want to have an advice on my mammography .I had it done on the 1st of Feb 2013 and report says.
Left breast:There is a glandular fatty background pattern.There is a suspicious cluster of microcalcification in the Lowe quadrant measuring approx 8.2x3.6mm
StatusR-3
Right breast:There is glandular fatty background pattern.There is a focus of beginning calcification.A healing.
Stereo core biopsy..result was not enough cell and was not removed in the right area.
So I saw the breast care Dr he was unable to give me a proper answer why they can 't give me another biopsy in between to have a better reading ,he was very rude and told me to come back to have a mammogram in 6 months.
Its so frustrated to wait and my under arm hurts and now time to time I have sharp shooting pain in my left breast.. 
Need all your advice if I should wait or have a second opinion..
Thanks to you all
Posts.Title: cluster microcalcification
